attributes.additional_details:
Type 1 diabetics are 3 times more likely to die from covid19 due to a comprising of the  immune system and the risk of high blood sugar complications once infected.
All type 1 diabetics should have the option to be shielded and be placed higher up the list of those eligible for covid19 vacancies
attributes.background: To shield all type 1 diabetics and give them priority to the covid19 vacancies

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/322581

Decisions about who is clinically extremely vulnerable, and therefore subject to the Government's guidance, is a clinical decision, not a decision for the Government or House of Commons.

We could accept a petition calling for people with diabetes to be given priority access to Covid-19 vaccines.
